Flexatar Notification

  • Launch any audio or video meeting, such as Google Meet, to experience the effect in real time.
  • Open the Flexatar UI panel by clicking the Flexatar extension icon in the Chrome extensions toolbar.
  • Create your Flexatar from just one front-facing photo.
  • You may notice a slight delay when your Flexatar speaks on your screen; however, for the other participant, the lips are perfectly synced with the audio.
  • You may notice a slight delay when your Flexatar speaks on your screen.
  • However, for the other participant, the lips are perfectly synced with the audio.
